description: GRPCExtAuthService defines the gRPC External Authorization service The authorization request message is defined in https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/api-v3/service/auth/v3/external_auth.proto

backendRef.description:
BackendRef references a Kubernetes object that represents the backend server to which the authorization request will be sent.

Deprecated: Use BackendRefs instead.

backendRefs.description: BackendRefs references a Kubernetes object that represents the backend server to which the authorization request will be sent.

backendSettings.description: BackendSettings holds configuration for managing the connection to the backend.
